bioAsHtml: Noel Markham started out as a Java developer in finance, before moving to functional programming in startups for both games and social media. He currently works for ITV, a national TV broadcaster in the UK.

acceptedTalks.summaryAsHtml: The strange syntax and unfamiliar language used in Scalaz can often be a barrier to entry for using it. This talk aims to show what value you can get from using Scalaz in your projects, and help you comprehend some of the unusual terminology used.
acceptedTalks.title: Scalaz, or: how I learned to stop worrying and love monads
